text: Franck Marlin, a member of the National Assembly of France Franck Marlin (born September 30, 1964) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the 2nd constituency of the Essonne département, Marlin was born in Orléans, Loiret, and is a member of the Republicans. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:People from Orléans Category:Radical Party (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Franck Marlin
